name: Garry the Wizard 2: An Unexpected Sequal
name_original: Garry the Wizard 2: An Unexpected Sequal
description: After the epic finale of the first game that literally nobody saw (trust me, it was some metal stuff), Garry is again called to save the world of Garrytopia as Evil Lord Doom has resurrected his army of loyal skeletons. Hunt down this very bad man and save the world in this epic FPS from the guy who brought you Garry the Wizard
